name: Weekly 1:1 Meeting
description:
Run your 1:1s more effectively


This 1:1 template is for managers or reports that want to work through their 1:1 time in a more effective and collaborative way.


This Jam helps you identify topics, problems and areas that worth talking about or spending time on. Define next steps as action items and understand where managers can help support their reports.


Questions asked:

  • What‚Äôs top of mind for you right now?
  • What is this week's ideal outcome look like?
  • What do you think is the best way for you to get there?
  • What can I do to make it happen/make the week successful?
  • What was the most useful part of our conversation today?
